member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.LotSelectUpdateImpl.CheckDupLotNum(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: This method checks the Lot Number to see if there is any duplicate lot number used by another part number. A warning message will be returned to the user asking if the user wants to continue creating a duplicate lot number. This needs to be run before Update method. If the user answers yes to the question then the update method can be run.
member.param: The Lot Number to be checked for duplicate
Part Number associated with the current Lot Number
Returns a warning message for duplicate lot number

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.LotSelectUpdateImpl.GenerateNewLotNum(System.String,System.String@)
member.param: Part Number associated with the current Lot Number
Returns the next valid lot number
